article:
In the doctor's waiting room, sick men and women were sitting on the chair. Bob, a school boy, was among them. They all looked very sad _ Bob. He lost himself in an _ story in a magazine. Just then the doctor came in and said he was ready _ the next person. Bob jumped up and ran into the doctor's room. "What's your trouble?" asked the doctor. Before Bob could say a word, the doctor made him lie down on the bed. "Now I'll listen to your heart beat." Bob tried to speak, but the doctor told him not to _ anything.
"I'll _ your temperature." Bob tried to sit up , but the doctor stopped  him. After a moment, the doctor said, "Well, boy, don't _ . There is nothing wrong with you." "I know," said Bob. "I just come to fetch  some medicine for my father."
